channel.title: Why You Should Play MoparScape - Informitive Video - Created By: Thax
channel.description:
[center][b]Why You Should Play MoparScape [/b] [i]Informitive Video - Created By: Thax[/i][/center]
[hr]
Hello and welcome if you have never downloaded or played MoparScape then this topic is just for you. I have created a video on MoparScape
and it's sweet abilities.
[b]YouTube:[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7EY5SNQhaJc][b]Click Here[/b][/url] [b]MegaUpload (Better Quality - Recommended):[/b] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6TXWO1YZ][b]Click Here[/b][/url]
[b]True Facts: You can go on P2P Side. You start off at Mines south-west of Varrock. Commands Only Work ONLINE.[/b] [hr] [i]Made your mind and want to play?[/i] Go [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html]here[/url]. All the files and downloads you need. [hr] Still don't feel safe downloading a client from a total stranger? Click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/]here[/url] to access the WebClient; currently supporting: HybridScape. [b]Remember to NOT USE your RuneScape password.[/b] [hr] Made a server and want to get some people playing on it? Advertise your server by clicking
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,50.0.html]here[/url]. Follow the rules! [hr] Need help on any manging your server, click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html]here[/url] to access RS Server Tutorials to give you a hand. [hr] Wanna make a RSC Server or anything related to RuneScape Classic? Visit
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,52.0.html]here[/url] for more information. [hr] Got questions you can't answer all by yourself relating to MoparScape? Click
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,87.0.html]here[/url] to post. [hr] Talk about your exploits with the 317 client [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,91.0.html]here[/url]. [b] Thank you for reading! [/b] [glow=red,2,300]- Thax[/glow]

[hr]

Hello and welcome if you have never downloaded or played MoparScape then this topic is just for you. I have created a video on MoparScape

True Facts:
You can go on P2P Side.
You start off at Mines south-west of Varrock.
Commands Only Work ONLINE.
